tool_description:
Find Phone Numbers, Work Email Addresses or Personal Email Addresses for anyone WorldWide - 
 90%> Success.
name: CerebriaAPI
title: CerebriaAPI

api_list.name: Get Work Email
api_list.description:
This results in a work email. If it finds more than one email, they will be returned in an array.

It may also return a phone number if one is found during the search.

api_list.name: Get Phone Number
api_list.description:
This results in a phone number. If it finds more than one phone number, they will be returned in an array.

It may also return a work email if one is found during the search.

It may return a work or a personal number.

api_list.name: Get Personal Email
api_list.description: This results in a personal email. If it finds more than one email, they will be returned in an array.
